articles.author: Emilia David
articles.title: Researchers say Bing made up facts about European elections - The Verge
articles.description: Bing created fake allegations or incorrect information about German and Swiss elections, researchers from AlgorithmWatch said.
articles.content:
Researchers say Bing made up facts about European elections
Researchers say Bing made up facts about European elections
 / AlgorithmWatch said Bing rarely applied safety guidelines.
ByEmilia David… [+3811 chars]
